import React from 'react'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Navbar, Nav, Container } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useAuthContext } from '../hooks/useAuthContext' import { ThreeDotsVertical } from 'react-bootstrap-icons'; export default function Sidebar() { const { user } = useAuthContext() return (
  • Hey {user.displayName}
  • Dashboard
  • Create Project
); }
